p: Investigational bacteria designated to Staphylococccus aureus, Lactobacillus casei, Bacillus azotoformans, Bacillus azotoformans, Bacillus cereus, Salmonella typhi, Escherichia coli, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and fungus named to Candida albicans, Cryptococcus neoformans, Blastomyces dermatitidis, Trichoderma spp. all the clinical pathogens were obtained from the Department of Pharmacy, International Islamic University Chittagong, Bangladesh.
